components Package¶

components Package¶

The components package within derived.

This package contains all component types derived from the base Component.

code_component Module¶

class roco.derived.components.code_component.CodeComponent(yaml_file=None, name=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: roco.api.component.Component

assemble()¶

Assemble the component by merging the code of all subcomponents together into one CodeComposable

define(**kwargs)¶

Function for overriding interfaces.

Args:
**kwargs: Arbitrary keyword arguments
get_modified_name()¶

Function that returns modified name without any ‘.’

Args:
None
get_token_subs()¶

Returns a dictionary containing all key value pairs for parameters.

Returns:
Dictionary of all parameters and their values
mangle_names()¶

Mangle all global variable and parameter names in the code to a component specific string so that no variable names collide.

Args:
None

Bases: roco.api.component.Component

assemble()¶

Assemble the component by merging the code of all subcomponents together into one ElectricalComposable

Returns an array containing 0’s of length “pins”

Args:
pin (integer): Number of pins on ElectricalComponent

folded_component Module¶

The FoldedComponent class.

This module contains the FoldedComponent class which is a base class for all physical objects that can be constructed by folding 2D faces.

class roco.derived.components.folded_component.FoldedComponent(yaml_file=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: roco.derived.components.mechanical_component.MechanicalComponent

A type of MechanicalComponent is a base for all foldable structures.

The FoldedComponent class contains a graph composable that stores the folded structure as the component is built.

define(origin=False, euler=False, quat=False, **kwargs)¶

Function that defines the state of a FoldedComponent

Args:
origin (bool): whether component starts at the origin or not euler (bool): whether to use euler angles to represent rotation or not quat (bool): whether to use quaternions to represent rotation or not **kwargs (dict): arbitrary keyword arguments for define

mechanical_component Module¶

The MechanicalComponent class.

This module contains the MechanicalComponent class which is a base class for all physical objects that have a position and rotation in space.

class roco.derived.components.mechanical_component.MechanicalComponent(yaml_file=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: roco.api.component.Component

A derived component to act as a base for all mechanical objects.

The MechanicalComponent class adds a layer on top of Component which allows it to have dx, dy, dz parameters for location and qa, qi, qj, qk quaternion components to represent rotation.

All mechanical components can also be solved using their constraints and relations.

define(origin=False, euler=None, quat=False, **kwargs)¶

Function for overriding interfaces.

Args:
**kwargs: Arbitrary keyword arguments
